testcase.classname: User could register with valid data
testcase.name: user Register successfully
testcase.system-out: Given user go to registration page..........................................passed When user enter "Noha" and "Essam" and "noha.essam@gmail.com" and "170389" and "170389".passed And user clicks on register button..........................................passed Then user could register successfully.......................................passed And return to homepage......................................................passed

testcase.classname: User could log in with valid email and password
testcase.name: user login successfully
testcase.system-out: Given user navigates login page.............................................passed When user login with "noha.essam@gmail.com" and "170389"....................passed And user click on login button..............................................passed Then user could login successfully..........................................passed And redirected to homepage..................................................passed

testcase.classname: User could log in with valid email and password
testcase.name: user couldn't login successfully
testcase.system-out: Given user navigates login page.............................................passed When user login with "wrong@gmai.com" and "170389"..........................passed And user click on login button..............................................passed Then user could not login successfully......................................passed

testcase.name: Logged User could switch between currencies US-Euro
testcase.system-out: Given user could logged by "noha.essam@gmail.com" and "170389"..............passed Given user writes Product name "Apple MacBook"..............................passed Given user click on search button...........................................passed Then the system change the system currency..................................passed

testcase.classname: User could search for any product
testcase.name: Logged User could search for any product
testcase.system-out: Given user could login by "noha.essam@gmail.com" and "170389"...............passed Given user writes Product name "apple"......................................passed When user click on search button............................................passed Then the system show related product that include "Apple"...................passed

testcase.classname: the Logged user could select any different Categories in the system
testcase.name: Logged user could select different Categories
testcase.system-out: Given user could login by "noha.essam@gmail.com" and "170389"...............passed When user can hover on computer category and selects sub category notebook..passed Then the system show all sub category products..............................passed
